title: Middle School Family & Consumer Science Standards
subject: CTE

document.title: Iowa Career and Technical Education Middle School Standards

2979DA25A26B40E896BDD5990219CE8D.description: Demonstrate basic skills for production, alteration, repair and recycling of textiles, fashion and apparel.

B336C355C1674315810EACD87CE006FE.description: Analyze current technology, trends and innovations that facilitate design and production of textiles, fashion and apparel.

CA205EAF478E4D369D780F62A91323DD.description: Demonstrate skills needed to produce, alter or repair textiles, fashion  and apparel.

F33D080616174540AF0F493EB231204E.description: Analyze foodborne illness factors, including causes, potentially hazardous foods and methods of prevention.

3F94F7857D7E408887CBA8EA072D8C1C.description: Analyze conditions and practices that promote safe food handling.

66F0A887AD5F4FBA87389286EACDD9A6.description: Evaluate factors that affect food safety from production through  consumption.

38623A454A10495CAD888A82DB2B4492.description: Demonstrate ability to select, store, prepare and serve nutritious, aesthetically pleasing food and food products.

9678AD8549D54A718D97E50DD136C54E.description: Apply current dietary guidelines in planning to meet nutrition and wellness needs.

4C04648992234FE8914942DF03B93318.description: Demonstrate ability to acquire, handle and use foods to meet nutrition  and wellness needs of individuals and families across the life span.

6EED8A31F2DA45C0BA027C23D2E1C70E.description: Analyze sources of food and nutrition information, including food labels, related to health and wellness.

4A0D63ED87F04FB8B57863582B8D9D11.description: Analyze the effects of food and diet fads, food addictions and eating disorders on wellness.

2E5F62401DCF41E58EF131F8ACEF4DE4.description: Evaluate the effect of nutrition on health, wellness and performance.

22699AA10C5F47EFACF82F81F5D36391.description: Examine the nutritional needs of individuals and families in relation to  health and wellness across the life span.

ED7C957FFAD7446B8A2D4ACA6D758194.description: Demonstrate nutrition and wellness practices that enhance individual  and family well-being.

BE3200FFFD2F4C2FB9B5F2C6DCBD7973.description: Analyze the effects of self-esteem and self-image on relationships.

CF73171CC2734E50896BE57376EBBEEA.description: Analyze the effects of personal characteristics on relationships.

463A01F9FC73408C81E776AE6D099B0F.description: Analyze personal needs and characteristics and their effects on  interpersonal relationships.

071DB987945B4833B43FEDF3118A03CE.description: Demonstrate stress management strategies for family, work and community settings.

2292DD8ADB794AE892F12E8834C064D5.description: Analyze factors that contribute to healthy and unhealthy relationships.

38F50453908346448EA2F33181EA9CA8.description: Analyze processes for building and maintaining interpersonal relationships.

EEB2DC7020B8439CABAE7A2A40015033.description: Analyze functions and expectations of various types of relationships.

F3DB2A2F2535402D8E0B9DA6A9F452EA.description: Demonstrate respectful and caring relationships in the family, workplace  and community.

37DAEE683E3041EAA49976A2257DC87C.description: Analyze the role of communication on human growth and development.

DE7B911E1E3D4E7A975B61F674797696.description: Analyze the role of nurturance on human growth and development.

59D4851F71884BCDB711F97DE3A65FAA.description: Analyze strategies that promote growth and development across the life  span.

E8CE615E82B2476EA22E83D52D72C81C.description: Analyze the influences of life events on individuals' physical, emotional, social, moral and cognitive development.

C598A90991154C49863560C794213B67.description: Analyze the influences of social, economic and technological forces on individual growth and development.

D4ABC9BC967D4453AEC680F532B1CB38.description: Analyze the influences of heredity and environment on human growth and development.

DAF228CBB70C424F87C4EC4E1BA6D014.description: Analyze conditions that influence human growth and development.

C3B27304E2D8431292F6B0C5A8E336F1.description: Analyze interrelationships among physical, emotional, social, moral and cognitive aspects of human growth and development.

DF9BFE2E3D214EFB88A710B1610D3A69.description: Analyze physical, emotional, social, moral and cognitive development.

491A3088BA1041E3BEEE4604C9EE0D4B.description: Analyze principles of human growth and development across the life  span.

D2CB7C61905F4586A287A19EE41D3F0D.description: Analyze factors that influence human growth and development.

915A429D217B4135BA4F9890EA085CF1.description: Analyze the psychological impact that the principles and elements of design have on the individual.

141EC4EB86074262A87BCC9684B96AB4.description: Evaluate the use of elements and principles of design in housing and commercial and residential interiors.

E268FD5F89184263985321C8B593277A.description: Evaluate housing and design concepts and theories, including sustainability and universal design, in relation to available resources and options.

3B945A1E9EA144D88A3E24F28FEC4AF3.description: Demonstrate professional skill for a variety of cooking methods including roasting, broiling, smoking, grilling, saut√©ing, pan frying, deep frying, braising, stewing, poaching, steaming and baking using professional equipment and current technologies.

941495EAC0F34AB7A3196E4CC409EAD1.description: Demonstrate professional skills in safe handling of knives, tools and equipment.

A0014AEE27234627AE9C4C58C313F6CF.description: Demonstrate professional food preparation methods and techniques for  all menu categories to produce a variety of food products that meet  customer needs.

38F58036C8D34420B7A6955D06B575F6.description: Analyze current types of cleaning and sanitizing materials for proper use.

E0895B9A7C2B4FC1ABA6C5DF399FF2F4.description: Practice standard personal hygiene and wellness procedures.

69652D3B952B4A9584ECC371CA0B541A.description: Demonstrate food safety and sanitation procedures.

8CDA85904CA841AD850286BAF00D97C3.description: Integrate knowledge, skills and practices required for careers in food  production and services.

84837F94A1024CBA80F72A7AC52B4758.description: Summarize the importance of friends, family and community relationships for individuals with a variety of conditions that affect their well-being.

10DF0288532B4B4B837C17AB43C81EE8.description: Differentiate between situations that require personal prevention or intervention and those situations that require professional assistance.

401E689FC51841DD996B5E3BF3B6B10F.description: Investigate health, wellness and safety issues of individuals and families with a variety of conditions that could influence their well-being.

48B2E7E16945425FA5CFD85D003BE19A.description: Analyze the impact of conditions that could influence the well-being of  individuals and families.

D8AB12B2D42D47AFA74F1D16A0FEDC8A.description: Analyze the effects of social and cultural diversity on individuals and families.

26D291ECDB1B47A086D5E089188BEE68.description: Demonstrate awareness of multiple diversities and their effects on individuals, families and society.

DF413BC6CF8C47AB944E851C4B48B6FF.description: Evaluate the effects of diverse perspectives, needs and characteristics of  individual families.

5274B9FEEDC349D890B6FDBAE8212251.description: Analyze the role of family in transmitting societal expectations.

627A4EBC26B84D3F934C607ECC1F2892.description: Analyze family as the basic unit of society.

B2E6C007771C45C7BF14293A34E48867.description: Analyze the effects of family as a system on individuals and society.

5E73831766E74573BEED15F066C8607C.description: Evaluate the significance of family and its effects on the well-being of  individuals and society.

ECCE62D978F84CBF82B59B927D4D3F5D.description: Apply financial management principles to individual and family financial practices.

38312C63E28B4B99B76F6F0F363C1506.description: Evaluate the need for personal and family financial planning.

AEF780C097774F4D932263C2E3625E72.description: Demonstrate management of financial resources to meet the goals of  individuals and families across the lifespan.

9F6F215761D74268AE36CF407B1AB1C4.description: Analyze how individuals and families make choices to satisfy needs and wants.

C3E7DC59A4FC4CEFA893D004F08D5F46.description: Apply time management, organizational and process skills to prioritize tasks and achieve goals.

F436C95D5B4042CFBD15E65C9F5C656D.description: Demonstrate management of individual and family resources such as  food, clothing, shelter, health care, recreation, transportation, time and  human capital.

C65A3366F2FC437C821C87158A54608F.description: Evaluate management practices related to the human, economic and  environmental resources in a global context.

F2349403E0FA47B8BAB287F42E9C82FF.description: Develop a life plan, including pathways to acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to achieve individual, family and career goals.

63B7E36EC55C4ACFA88B9B93E894330E.description: Analyze potential effects of various career path decisions on balancing work and family.

009294998E954432907EC0B7E62E83F0.description: Analyze strategies to manage multiple roles and responsibilities (individual, family, career, community and global).

D56C7FF5C7D1400D96C945DF6B2950E9.description: Integrate multiple life roles and responsibilities in family, work and community settings.
